long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your Chrome browser into a powerful SEO workstation with our SEO Chrome Extension - a comprehensive extension for SEO professionals. Built by full-time SEOs and refined through community feedback, this SEO extension streamlines your daily SEO workflow with essential tools and real-time analysis capabilities.

🚀 Essential SEO Features:

📊 Website Overview - Complete On-Page SEO Analysis
✅Instant Core Web Vitals analysis
✅Meta data verification
✅Robots.txt and sitemap detection
✅Page indexability status
✅Canonical URL validation

🔍 SEO Analysis Tools
✅Header hierarchy analyzer
✅Internal & external link audit
✅Image optimization checker
✅Schema markup validator
✅Live HTML editor

⚡ Quick SEO Actions
✅One-click text extraction
✅Bulk link export
✅Navigation menu analysis
✅Page screenshots
✅Header highlighting

🛠️ Professional SEO Tools Include:

✅Link Analysis:
➡️Internal/external link filtering
➡️Anchor text analysis
➡️Quick link export
➡️Advanced link search

✅Image Optimization:
➡️Alt text verification
➡️Image URL extraction
➡️Missing alt detection

✅Schema Tools:
➡️Dynamic schema extraction
➡️Quick copy functionality
➡️Structured data validation

🆕 Coming Soon:
🔜CMS detection
🔜Technology stack analysis

💡 Built for SEO Professionals

Perfect for in-house SEOs, agencies, and consultants who need reliable, quick access to technical SEO data. Our extension combines professional-grade features with an intuitive interface for maximum efficiency.

🔄 Regular Updates
We continuously enhance our SEO extension based on user feedback and industry developments. Share your feature suggestions at info@redseo.io.
